snippet.title: Birth ME Code Official Trailer
snippet.description:
You are Pandora, the mastermind behind a game where everyone puts their life on the line. Your goal is simple: you must figure out the traitor and kill them, then end the game before someone figures out you are the one behind their abduction and kills you. Will you manage to manipulate everyone's trust to fulfill your plans? Or will you fail and be erased? Even the mastermind behind a death game does not always know how the events will go...

Birth ME Code is the second entry in the ABiMe franchise. Inspired by series such as Zero Escape and Danganronpa, it is a puzzle visual novel adventure game where you control the mastermind and must manipulate the other characters to reach new endings. Can you elucidate the mystery behind Pandora's game?

Try the demo here: https://miracle-moon.itch.io/birth-me-code
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1249260/Birth_ME_Code/

Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TeamMiracleMoon
itch.io creator page: https://miracle-moon.itch.io/
Join the Team Miracle Moon Discord! https://discord.gg/DMedkbD

Opening trailer made by KotoriMWorks
Assets made by Miracle Moon, merouses, Badriel, Surafin, Rgbvscb and KotoriMWorks
Music composed by Alec Shea
